author: cnbc.com
title: Willdan posts 4Q profit
text:
ANAHEIM, Calif. (AP) _ Willdan Group Inc. (WLDN) on Thursday reported fourth-quarter net income of $3.3 million.
The Anaheim, California-based company said it had net income of 36 cents per share. Earnings, adjusted for pretax gains, were 22 cents per share.
The energy efficiency and sustainability consultant posted revenue of $64.2 million in the period.
For the year, the company reported profit of $12.1 million, or $1.32 per share. Revenue was reported as $273.4 million.
Willdan expects full-year earnings in the range of $1.95 to $2.05 per share, with revenue in the range of $130 million to $140 million.
Willdan shares have declined 4.5 percent since the beginning of the year. In the final minutes of trading on Thursday, shares hit $22.86, a decline of 19 percent in the last 12 months.
